name: places/ChIJOWv2uaxZwokR4n-LtjpyRiY
formattedAddress: 507 W 28th St, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 507 W 28th St, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text:
Our son has been attending this MSH location since early 2023 when he joined the "Voyagers" class at 16mo old and we couldn't be happier! Everyone there is so kind, dedicated and caring, from the lovely school directors to the wonderful teachers and assistants.

It's a small school with few classrooms, so everyone working there knows all the kids and helps out when needed. Communication with the school is always seamless as they’re incredibly responsive - we get daily reports from an app, but also email communications and calls as needed. Also worth noting the admissions process was so smooth and easy - we got assisted very well through every step.

They're constantly creating fun little events for parents to participate in with the kids, like a fall picnic, art events and more. The school environment is warm and inviting, calming and clean. Our son really enjoys there and he’s developed so much since starting there! He loves his circle time, creative activities with his buddies, music, soccer and yoga classes! He still talks about his teachers from his previous year - a testament of how great they are.

originalText.text: My child attended Manhattan Schoolhouse from age 3-5 at the Chelsea location. We had a wonderful experience and highly recommend them to others. My daughter had caring and attentive teachers who helped shape the early years of her life. We were sad to say goodbye and will miss our daily interactions with the staff and teachers.

text.text: My child attended Manhattan Schoolhouse from age 3-5 at the Chelsea location. We had a wonderful experience and highly recommend them to others. My daughter had caring and attentive teachers who helped shape the early years of her life. We were sad to say goodbye and will miss our daily interactions with the staff and teachers.

originalText.text: Our son has been attending Manhattan Schoolhouse for three years now, and we absolutely love it. Most important is the nurturing loving environment the staff has created for the children. My son is excited to go to school everyday and see his friends. You can tell the teachers truly care about the children's education and put a lot of their spare time into preparing classroom activities. Highly recommend!

text.text: Our son has been attending Manhattan Schoolhouse for three years now, and we absolutely love it. Most important is the nurturing loving environment the staff has created for the children. My son is excited to go to school everyday and see his friends. You can tell the teachers truly care about the children's education and put a lot of their spare time into preparing classroom activities. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: We love Manhattan Schoolhouse, we have been going there since they opened up and I can only say good things about the School! Sure there is always going to be something that you may or may not like but they genuinely try to integrate any suggestions we as parents make. Our kids are really happy there, and the teachers are lovely! They care a lot about the kids and organize many fun activities to keep the kids engaged. They go outside at least once a day, they have a nice playground close to the School but also visit galleries and other interesting places in the neighborhood (weather permitting)! They also have a great after care program with lots of art projects, our kids are never bored and always come home with lots of stories to tell! Also a shout out to the wonderful staff/administration who do a great job at running the School! Overall a great community/great School, which we highly recommend if you're looking into schools in the Hudson Yards area!

originalText.text: My daughter attends Manhattan Schoolhouse and it has been such a heartwarming experience. It is her first time in a school / daycare setting so she did feel uneasy at first. However, after a couple of weeks she fell into the routine and was able to assimilate herself as part of the class. She will sing songs that she learns in her class on our commute to and from the school and will make sure to include all of her friends' names in them as well as her teachers - who are so warm, loving, nurturing, kind, and thoughtful in every way! It is the best feeling in the world to be able to confidently leave your child in someone else's hands knowing full well that they will be cared for lovingly. The teachers will send daily reports about all the different activities they've done for the day which include lots of pictures; the best part! We are having a great time at MSH - thank you!
